column3: Tourism;Siem Reap: Open electrical boxes have been spotted next to the Siem Reap river.------These boxes
column4: with live wiring and fuses inside have been tied to trees at low height and left uncovered along the walkway.------Although no injuries have occurred yet
column5: it can only be a matter of time
column6: and have the potential to be deadly
column7: especially in the rainy season.------There are also concerns for tourists
column9: as well as the unsightly image the wires give for the city.------Rasmei News
